The attacks from Jhiaxus, Scorponok, Hydras and Myrmidon are remarkably eff=
ective at first as the=A0firepower burned into the sweeps, destroying quite=
 a few of them in bright explosions=A0sending bits of metal and armor spewi=
ng in different directions.=A0=A0
The Sweeps swirl in the air for a moment =
and then seperate, leaving the nice and easy formations of before, and beco=
ming apparently just a mass of disorginized attackers, making them much har=
der to hit several with a single shot!
As they come back towards the ground=
 they target Grimlock, Scorponok and Hydras with disintergration beams from=
 several different directions, even as more Sweeps come at Jhiaxus and Myrm=
idon, cannons flaring! 
(OOC: I will get more specific in the next round of=
 posting)

Preston
(da'minion)

----- Original Message ----
From: Richard A=
llen <roborick007@...>
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Tuesday, June=
 24, 2008 9:40:52 PM
Subject: Re: All Out War


::Lord Jhiaxus::
=A0
As the=
 Sweeps start to break off Jhiaxus pulls up at a steep angle. This avoids t=
he last shots.
=A0
Jhiaxus: Don't let up. They can't be finished!
=A0
Jhiax=
us comes up high in the air and turns about. He comes at the Sweeps. At the=
 very last second he pulls up above them and starts droping cluster bombs.
=
=A0
::Scorponok- Zarak::
=A0
Scorponok releases two missiles from each pinc=
er at the nearest mass of Sweeps.

--- On Mon, 6/23/08, Super Cyclonus <sup=
ercyclonus@ yahoo.com> wrote:

From: Super Cyclonus <supercyclonus@ yahoo.c=
om>
Subject: Re: All Out War
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups. com
Date: Monday, June=
 23, 2008, 5:28 PM


> Jhiaxus' boasts are stopped as he realized that alth=
ough he was effective, the 
> Sweeps had changes strategy and were boxing h=
im in. Suddenly some of the 
> rear Sweeps were destroyed by Myrmidon. Jhia=
xus banks out of the trap with him.
> 
> Jhiaxus: I hate to say this but I =
wish the Maximals would fight back more...
=A0
Myrmidon grunted as he fell =
in with Jhiaxus, =93They are pitiful fools but how can even they sit there =
and do nothing as the ground upon which they stand is being blown out from =
beneath them!?=94
=A0
> As Sweeps moved into position to box in Jhiaxus aga=
in. Jhiaxus pulls up and 
> performs a 360 degree dive, ending up behind th=
e approaching Sweeps. He 
> fires all rockets and lasers.
=A0
Myrmidon foll=
owed Jhiaxus, his maneuver not quite as elegant as the G2 Decepticon co-com=
mander, but he managed to come around, lining up on the Sweeps!
=A0
From th=
eir twin bursts of firepower many sweeps vanish in bright clusters of explo=
sions that peal through the skies! A rather respectable gap is opened up fo=
r the duo as the moved through the skies. 
=A0
> Blckfortress defences burn=
ed as Minions started to hit them, the repair drones 
> started to work but=
 they started to fall as well. hydras cotinued opening fire
> against the m=
inions
=A0
The sweeps are generally taking a beating, but it can be noted t=
hat they are learning as they go, becoming smarter and more agile as the we=
aponry they are faced with begins to grow. Many of them are gunned down by =
the laser fire of Myrmidon, Jhiaxus and then the Black Fortress, and yet th=
ey continue to keep coming, an unrelenting force of power rushing the meage=
r defenders of the Predicon base. 
=A0
With an eerie strangeness, as if gui=
ded by some unseen intelligence, they fire their weapons in retaliation com=
pletely in sync, disintegrator beams ripping into the jets (Myrmidon/Jhiaxu=
s) above and at the (Black) fortress below. Then swiftly they swoop high in=
to the air again, temporarily giving the base below a gap, a small space to=
 breathe. It is obvious that any moment now they will again begin to press =
their attack as their numbers quickly begin to regroup and organize.
=A0
> =
OOC: if drones arent allowed just ignore that part
=A0
OOC: I can=92t speak=
 for anyone else, but I have no problem with drones.
=A0
Preston
(Da'minion=
)

ad><body><div style=3D"font-family:Courier New, courier, monaco, monospace,=
 sans-serif;font-size:12pt"><P>The attacks from Jhiaxus, Scorponok, Hydras =
and Myrmidon are remarkably effective at first as the firepower burned=
 into the sweeps, destroying quite a few of them in bright explosions =
sending bits of metal and armor spewing in different directions. &nbsp=
;</P>
<P> </P>
<P>The Sweeps swirl in the air for a moment and then se=
perate, leaving the nice and easy formations of before, and becoming appare=
ntly just a mass of disorginized attackers, making them much harder to hit =
several with a single shot!</P>
<P> </P>
<P>As they come back towards =
the ground they target Grimlock, Scorponok and Hydras with disintergration =
beams from several different directions, even as more Sweeps come at Jhiaxu=
s and Myrmidon, cannons flaring! </P>
<P> </P>
<P>(OOC: I will get mor=
e specific in the next round of posting)</P>
